text: Stevović (, ) is a Serbo-Croatian surname derived from a masculine given name Stevo. Notable people with the surname include: *Marko Stevović (born 1996), Serbian alpine skier *Ratko Stevović (born 1956), Montenegrin football manager ==See also== * Stević * Stevanović Category:Serbian-language surnames Category:Montenegrin-language surnames Category:Slavic-language surnames Category:Patronymic surnames
title: Stevović
